comments.author: Berly
comments.body: Yes, seemed as though Dave's infamous bat-like directional instinct was a tad wander some yesterday. Once I realized he was staring at his down tube for the majority of the ride trying to friction shift, I knew I was in for a treat! Fancy wheels man, and I mean, just the wheels! He also forgot to mention that his canon-ball into the Boulder Creek left two innocent bystanders with some explaining to do back at work! Boy, he sure can push a wave, that Dave.
